description:
Cold-weather camping has it's difficulties, more than just staying warm. Whether you're in a snow cave or a tent, moisture and wind can be an issue. Enter: the Winterlite. It's outer shell sheds condensation and shrugs off winter gusts, with 1000mm waterproofness to prevent the bag from feeling damp. High-loft down throughout holds in your body heat, and 11 individual down chambers in the foot box wrap your feet to prevent cold spots and keep your feet toasty. The draft collar closes with a snap button and, unlike a standard hook-and-loop closure, won't snag clothing or catch your hair.

  • Lightweight NeoVent-S outer shell is water-resistant, windproof and downproof
  • 800+ fill power, high loft goose down meets the Responsible Down Standard for animal welfare
  • 2-chamber construction keeps down evenly distributed throughout bag
  • I-beam baffles allow maximum down loft and, therefore, warmth
  • Draft collar and cinchable hood seal in heat
  • 2-way YKK #5 zipper connects with other bags with the same zipper
  • Zippers have glow-in-the-dark pull tabs
  • Additional internal baffles in foot box eliminate cold spots
  • Internal pocket keeps phone or batteries warm
name: Exped Winterlite -15 Down Sleeping Bag - Unisex
